### For Checklist Changes

- [ ] Added clear checkbox items
- [ ] Included explanations of why rules matter
- [ ] Provided code examples in Kotlin or React/TypeScript
- [ ] Referenced authoritative sources (OWASP, official docs)
- [ ] Updated table of contents

### For README or Major Docs

- [ ] Updated table of contents
- [ ] Checked all internal links
- [ ] Ensured consistent formatting
- [ ] Verified examples are accurate
